description.value:
Starting at 3rd level, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don't count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Alchemist Spells

Artificer Level Spell
3rd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]{Cure Wounds}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.E9J7WRW1WOWKJXGX]{Ray of Sickness}
5th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.FjYE214HTERCRZNm]{Flaming Sphere}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M]{Acid Arrow}
9th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]{Gaseous Form}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.34ddoYIrnOZ2GFYi]{Mass Healing Word}
13th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y]{Blight}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.VtCXMdyM6mAdIJZb]{Death Ward}
17th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.LkvI11Uue774QBKZ]{Cloudkill}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.AGFMPAmuzwWO6Dfz]{Raise Dead}
